   dout2 <= NOT(x_internal_internal(6)) AND btn(1) AND enable;

   dout <= din1 & dout2;

      WHEN "01" => dout1 <= data_out;
      WHEN "10" => dout1 <= din2;
      WHEN "11" => dout1 <= x_internal_internal;
      WHEN OTHERS => dout1 <= (OTHERS => 'X');
      END CASE;
   END PROCESS u_2combo_proc;
